name: Workflowy Lightweight Markdown Flavored
description: a lightweight Workflowy theme using 'Roboto' as primary font and 'Roboto Mono' for notes.
additional_info:
Flavored with markdown-style inline code and block code style.
Underlined text triggered by "Ctrl/Cmd+U" will be rendered like Markdown-like code snippet.
Note section simulates the Markdown code block
